parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.42</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> local</value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Arguments</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Object Manipulation </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Gets the suppression value for the given unit. Returns varying [[Number]] between 0 and 1, or -1 if suppression is disabled (<tt>[[disableAI]] "SUPPRESSION"</tt>) or the suppression value is not available. Suppression is not calculated for player entities and is always 0, unless it is set with [[setSuppression]]. In this case the return value is the set value. Before Arma 3 v1.91.145360 this command could return [[nil]].<br><br>  
<template lineStart="1"><title>Important </title><part><name index="1"/><value> The unit must not be [[objNull]], must be [[local]] and [[alive]]</value></part></template> </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''getSuppression''' unit </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]]  </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]] - from 0 to 1, or -1 if suppression is not available. </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code> [[getSuppression]] AI_unit_1;
</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value> 

____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[setSuppression]], [[suppressFor]], [[disableAI]], [[enableAI]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name index="7"/><value>  </value></part><part><name>MPBEHAVIOUR</name>=<value> 
____________________________________________________________________________________________
</value></part></template>
